Lunn wa Kaze no Naka: This is the third episode in the Lion Books Series, in which a boy who has fallen in love with a girl on a poster on the wall starts to look for her. This story depicts the heartache of adolescent first love in a low-key manner.
['Lion Books', 'Amefuri Kozou', 'Adachi-ga Hara', 'Yamatarou Kaeru', 'Midori no Neko', 'Akuemon']
